text: William McPheat (4 September 1942 – 7 April 2019) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from North Lanarkshire Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Willie McPheat
